Package com.mycalendar.activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllCalendarList
    This class manages the action to perform on the list of all calendar the user has in its application.
    AllEventsList  
    CalendarEditor
    It sets and manages the creation of a new calendar.
    CalendarShow
    This class takes care of showing the details about a calendar.
    EventEditor
    This is the class to create a new event and modify a already existing one.
    EventShow
    This class shown in a formatted way the information about an event.
    EventsView  
    ExportCalendar  
    ImportCalendar  
    ItemList  
    MainActivity
    This is the class of the main activity, called at the application start.
    Settings
    A PreferenceActivity that presents a set of application settings.
    Settings.DataSyncPreferenceFragment
    This fragment shows data and sync preferences only.
    Settings.GeneralPreferenceFragment
    This fragment shows general preferences only.
    Settings.NotificationPreferenceFragment
    This fragment shows notification preferences only.
    TimeFinder
